import React, { useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import logo from "./assets/logo.png"; import qr from "./assets/qr.png"; import successImg from "./assets/success.png"; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", occupation: "", email: "", whatsapp: "", topic: "", datetime: "", }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Read the uploaded image as Base64 let base64Image = ""; if (formData.screenshot) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(formData.screenshot); base64Image = await new Promise((resolve) => { reader.onload = () => resolve(reader.result); }); } // 1️⃣ Send confirmation to user emailjs .send( "service_ted5m2h", // Your service ID "template_5qmfosa", // User confirmation template { name: formData.name, email: formData.email, }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" // Your public key ) .then(() => console.log("Confirmation sent")); // 2️⃣ Alert admin (with all data + image) emailjs .send( "service_ted5m2h", // Your service ID "template_nzvxr9o", // Admin alert template { name: formData.name, email: formData.email, occupation: formData.occupation, whatsapp: formData.whatsapp, problem: formData.problem, preferredTime: formData.preferredTime, screenshot: base64Image, }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" // Your public key ) .then(() => console.log("Alert sent to admin")); setSubmitted(true); }; return (
{/* Header / Hero */}
